name: Girls Blocks: Exploration Saga
description:
Discover the fairy-tale world with the cute and beautiful Elsa, plunge into the fabulous world of fantasy and magic, explore and travel in search of new biomes where you can meet friends among them Rapunzel, Jasmine, Ariel and many other beauties. Create a fantastic dream house or a big castle for princesses.

The game includes a survival mode, a creative mode (destroy and build), where you can access all the blocks and objects, and the game mode Township - with various houses, shops, parks and residents of this small town!

It's simple: turn on and create your world from various beautiful cubes and harvested pieces of furniture and interior: flowers, paintings, kitchen, bedroom, living room, flower gardens and much more.

- Completely free game for children and adults.
- Different characters who communicate with you.
- Explore the mines, extract treasures and resources.
- Unique character selection system (for boys and girls)!
